# Description
Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Security update

## Security & Compliance
- [ ] **Access Control**: Does this PR add new roles or permissions?
- [ ] **Audit Logging**: Are sensitive actions logged using `AuditLogger`?
- [ ] **Data Protection**: Is new PII/PHI handled? If so, is it encrypted/redacted?

## Evidence
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated
- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Screenshots/Video attached (if UI change)

## Rollback Plan
If this deployment fails, how do we revert?
- [ ] Revert git commit
- [ ] Run db rollback script: `...`
